content.text: Match ends, FC Schalke 04 2, Nice 0.
Second Half ends, FC Schalke 04 2, Nice 0.
Valentin Eysseric (Nice) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Benjamin Stambouli (FC Schalke 04).
Yoan Cardinale (Nice) is shown the yellow card.
Second yellow card to Bernard Tekpetey (FC Schalke 04) for a bad foul.
Yoan Cardinale (Nice) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Bernard Tekpetey (FC Schalke 04).
Attempt missed. Alassane Pléa (Nice) header from the left side of the six yard box is close, but misses the top left corner. Assisted by Valentin Eysseric with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Nice. Conceded by Ralf Fährmann.
Attempt saved. Anastasios Donis (Nice) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Vincent Koziello.
Offside, FC Schalke 04. Bernard Tekpetey tries a through ball, but Fabian Reese is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Naldo (FC Schalke 04) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Dennis Aogo with a cross.
Bernard Tekpetey (FC Schalke 04) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Mathieu Bodmer (Nice).
Attempt saved. Valentin Eysseric (Nice) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Anastasios Donis.

Attempt blocked. Dalbert (Nice) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Vincent Marcel.
Attempt saved. Bernard Tekpetey (FC Schalke 04) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Donis Avdijaj.
Substitution, FC Schalke 04. Donis Avdijaj replaces Nabil Bentaleb because of an injury.
Goal!  FC Schalke 04 2, Nice 0. Dennis Aogo (FC Schalke 04) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Penalty FC Schalke 04. Bernard Tekpetey draws a foul in the penalty area.

Delay over. They are ready to continue.
